description: This file is a Python module that provides a wrapper for integrating with Supabase, a backend service. It includes functions to check if Supabase is enabled, initialize and retrieve a client, and perform health checks, all with feature flag support and safe optional dependencies.

methods.name: _settings
methods.description: Retrieves current configuration settings without caching at import time.

methods.name: _is_configured
methods.description: Checks if the necessary configuration for Supabase is present and valid.

methods.name: is_supabase_enabled
methods.description: Returns True if the feature flag is on and credentials are provided.

methods.name: get_supabase_client
methods.description: Returns a cached Supabase client if configured and enabled, otherwise None.

methods.name: supabase_health
methods.description: Provides a health status dictionary indicating if Supabase is enabled, configured, and available.
